name: Drifty Raft
description:
Intro

Drifty Raft is a turn-based strategic survival game designed during ScoreSpace Jam #23 in 72 hours. It implements a global high score system on LootLocker's leaderboard functionality.

Game Play

 You are a fisherman. Your main task is to fish as many fish as you can while surviving attacks from sea monsters!

 Hunter Shark: The most aggressive sea creature. It hunts you straight down.

 Prophet Octopus: The smartest sea creature. It tries to predict your movement and get in front of you.

 Squishy Squid: The sliest sea creature and the shark's best buddy. It collaborates with the shark and waits for you to fall into its trap.

 Muffy Sea Monster: The most mysterious sea creature. It tries to approach you but will keep a certain distance.

Yeh, the game has inspiration from Pacman. XD
